subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manager Don Mattingly pushed Zack Greinke’s scheduled start back a day, and Stephen Fife pitched into the sixth inning in his place as the Dodgers edged the Cubs.
snippet: Manager Don Mattingly pushed Zack Greinke’s scheduled start back a day, and Stephen Fife pitched into the sixth inning in his place as the Dodgers edged the Cubs.
